data.description:
This is a meme guild around the theme of the holy roman crusaders of 1095 – 1492.
Feel free to chat about funny medieval things related to religion.
Feel free to post crusader memes.
Feel free to PRETEND, we want to invade Constantinople (not that you can easily invade a city that dosent exist anymore...)
  
Feel free to start crusades in video game servers, just remember rule and guideline 2 No harassment.
  
You dont have to be christian to be a crusader, but we will burn all heretic. 
  
meme away and DEUS VULT
   

Check out +NoahGetTheBoat, for more memes.
Or, go to +Confession , if you have a heavy heart.
  
Still not enough content? Find our minecraft hub on @Drakus_ *the generous*'s server right here.
  
https://ruqqus.com/post/27m3/im-also-hosting-a-minecraft-server
  
Build a cross if you pass by!

Feel free to start crusades in video game servers, just remember rule and guideline 2 No harassment.

You dont have to be christian to be a crusader, but we will burn all heretic.

data.description:
### Posting Rules:
1. Posts have to be both factually correct and surprising/not well known.

* Posting that the mitochondria is the powerhouse of the cell does **not** fit these guidelines, however, posting that mitochondria reproduce on their own without the need to use ribosomes would. 


2. NSFW posts should be flagged as NSFW, and any NSLF post will be removed. 


3. Political posts need some form of evidence in order to prove that the post isn't an opinion.


4. No blatant reposting. 


* Reposts will inevitably occur, but as long as the content isn't word-for-word or the same topic as something addressed in hot/first 20 in top, then it's allowed.
data.description_html:
Posting Rules:

  1. Posts have to be both factually correct and surprising/not well known.
  • Posting that the mitochondria is the powerhouse of the cell does not fit these guidelines, however, posting that mitochondria reproduce on their own without the need to use ribosomes would.

  1. NSFW posts should be flagged as NSFW, and any NSLF post will be removed.

  2. Political posts need some form of evidence in order to prove that the post isn't an opinion.

  3. No blatant reposting.

  • Reposts will inevitably occur, but as long as the content isn't word-for-word or the same topic as something addressed in hot/first 20 in top, then it's allowed.

data.description:
Am I The Asshole?

A catharsis for the frustrated moral philosopher in all of us, and a place to finally find out if you were wrong in an argument that's been bothering you. Tell us about any non-violent conflict you have experienced; give us both sides of the story, and find out if you're right, or you're the asshole.

data.description: A political philosophy based on the Non-Aggression Principle, which holds that people should be allowed to live as they choose and make their own choices without interference from government or others, so long as those choices do not involve the initiation of force or fraud against others.

data.description:
Worldbuilding is the process of establishing a setting and bringing it to life by detailing it with characters, rules, history, and anything else that makes it feel as real as the world we're already in. Any setting, any medium, any genre, as long as there's something original about your world, you're welcome here.

This guild serves as a place for artists of all kinds to gather and share ideas about worldbuilding, details about the worlds we've made, and advice for dealing with the many facets of worldbuilding.

As long as you've got something to share about a world you've made, or you need advice on how to develop certain parts of your setting, this is the place to be. Tell stories, share art, show off your conlangs, it's all good.

The only thing that I ask is that whatever you post, make sure you give enough context to understand what you've posted. What's going on in this art, what's this music for, etc.

Prompts, questions, etc. are more than welcome.
Original content only.
data.description_html:
Worldbuilding is the process of establishing a setting and bringing it to life by detailing it with characters, rules, history, and anything else that makes it feel as real as the world we're already in. Any setting, any medium, any genre, as long as there's something original about your world, you're welcome here.

This guild serves as a place for artists of all kinds to gather and share ideas about worldbuilding, details about the worlds we've made, and advice for dealing with the many facets of worldbuilding.

As long as you've got something to share about a world you've made, or you need advice on how to develop certain parts of your setting, this is the place to be. Tell stories, share art, show off your conlangs, it's all good.

The only thing that I ask is that whatever you post, make sure you give enough context to understand what you've posted. What's going on in this art, what's this music for, etc.

Prompts, questions, etc. are more than welcome. Original content only.
